document.full_text: china has hailed reconstruction efforts since a massive earthquake leveled parts of sichuan province three years ago as a major victory, but a lack of jobs and crippling debts to pay for new homes are making life difficult for many.
document.title: china quake rebuilding success masks deeper woes
lines_and_colors: china has hailed reconstruction efforts since a massive earthquake leveled parts of sichuan province three years ago as a major victory, but a lack of jobs and crippling debts to pay for new homes are making life difficult for many.
